title: Twisted Rightwards Arrows

nouns: A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).

description: Two arrows pointing right while crossing over one another. Used to indicate putting music on shuffle: randomizing the order of tracks in the upcoming playlist. May also be used to indicate two items switching places.
apple_vendor_description: The shuffle tracks button emoji, as seen on Apple devices, features a sleek, modern design with two interwoven arrows, suggesting randomness and a dynamic flow. Appleâ€™s glossy 3D shading gives the button a subtle metallic sheen, while smooth gradients and precise lighting create a sense of depth and tactility, making it appear ready to be pressed. This emoji is commonly used to indicate a desire for variety in music playback, a change of pace, or a spontaneous approach to tasks.
